title: What Will It Be?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Wow, what a cute cafe. Tokyo is amazing~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu. I come here often with that person. It’s one of my favorites. I thought you would like it too, Ruby-chan, so I’m glad we came here together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>So this is where you usually go on dates, huh, Ayumu-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Dates!? Uhh, it’s not like that. Umm, we would just have tea and a little chat like always, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hm? Ruby goes on a lot of dates with Onee-chan, though? With Hanamaru-chan and Yoshiko-chan too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah.... T-, that’s right. A date between friends! Today I’m on a date with you, after all, Ruby-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Hey Ayumu-san, what do you recommend here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Probably the mille crepes. I also recommend the latte art here. It’s adorable. There are many different ones, like leaves, hearts, and bears. It makes you excited about what you’re going to get each time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby would like to try that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’ll also order one then. I wonder what it’s going to be this time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
